statements.statement:
SELECT M.COMPANY_CD ,M.SYSKEY ,SUBSTR(M.PROD_DATE,0,4)||'/'||SUBSTR(M.PROD_DATE,5,2)||'/'||SUBSTR(M.PROD_DATE,7,2) AS PROD_DATE ,M.POST_DATE ,SUBSTR(M.PROD_DATE,0,4)||'/'||SUBSTR(M.PROD_DATE,5,2)||'/'||SUBSTR(M.PROD_DATE,7,2) AS PROD_DATE_OLD ,M.CEMENT_QTY ,M.STATUS ,M.GI_IF_DOC_SEQ ,M.RE_IF_DOC_SEQ ,M.GI_IF_RVS_DOC_SEQ ,M.RE_IF_RVS_DOC_SEQ ,M.SAP_RTN_MSG FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER M WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N' {#1} {#2} {#3} ORDER BY M.SYSKEY
AND M.PROD_DATE >= replace(${productDateFrom},'/','')
AND M.PROD_DATE <= replace(${productDateTo},'/','')
AND M.STATUS = ${status}

SELECT X.SYSKEY, X.PROD_DATE, X.STATUS, X.CLINKER, X.GYPSUM, X.ADDICIVE1, X.ADDICIVE2, X.CEMENT_QTY FROM ( SELECT O.SYSKEY, M.PROD_DATE, M.STATUS, MAX(DECODE(MATER_SEQ, 10, NVL(PROD_OUT_QTY, 0), 0)) AS clinker, MAX(DECODE(MATER_SEQ, 20, NVL(PROD_OUT_QTY, 0), 0)) AS gypsum, MAX(DECODE(MATER_SEQ, 30, NVL(PROD_OUT_QTY, 0), 0)) AS addicive1, MAX(DECODE(MATER_SEQ, 40, NVL(PROD_OUT_QTY, 0), 0)) AS addicive2, MAX(NVL(M.CEMENT_QTY, 0)) AS cement_qty FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_OUTPUT O JOIN TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER M ON O.SYSKEY = M.SYSKEY WHERE M.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND M.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' {#1} {#2} {#3} GROUP BY O.SYSKEY, M.PROD_DATE, M.STATUS ORDER BY SYSKEY ) X
AND M.PROD_DATE >= replace(${productDateFrom},'/','')
AND M.PROD_DATE <= replace(${productDateTo},'/','')
AND M.STATUS = ${status}
SELECT PROD_DATE FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER WHERE 1 = 1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND STATUS != '05' AND COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND PROD_DATE = REPLACE(${prodDate}, '/', '')

SELECT O.COMPANY_CD ,O.SYSKEY ,O.MATER_SEQ ,MI.MATER_CD ,MI.MATER_NM_EN AS MATER_NM ,MI.UNIT ,O.PROD_OUT_QTY ,O.STOR_LOCT ,O.ATTR1 FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_OUTPUT O, TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER M, TB_MATER_INFO MI WHERE O.COMPANY_CD = M.COMPANY_CD AND O.SYSKEY = M.SYSKEY AND MI.COMPANY_CD = O.COMPANY_CD AND MI.MATER_CD = O.MATER_CD AND O.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND O.SYSKEY = ${syskey} ORDER BY O.SYSKEY, O.MATER_SEQ

SELECT I.COMPANY_CD ,I.SYSKEY ,I.MATER_SEQ ,MI.MATER_CD ,MI.MATER_NM_EN AS MATER_NM ,MI.UNIT ,I.PROD_IN_QTY ,I.STOR_LOCT ,I.ATTR1 FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_INPUT I, TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER M, TB_MATER_INFO MI WHERE I.COMPANY_CD = M.COMPANY_CD AND I.SYSKEY = M.SYSKEY AND MI.COMPANY_CD = I.COMPANY_CD AND MI.MATER_CD = I.MATER_CD AND I.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND I.SYSKEY = ${syskey} ORDER BY I.SYSKEY,I.MATER_SEQ

SELECT ('BP'||NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(SYSKEY , 3, 7))) + 1,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')) || '001')) AS SYSKEY ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')||'/'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM')||'/'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD') PROD_DATE ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')||'/'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM')||'/'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD') POST_DATE ,'' AS PROD_DATE_OLD ,0 AS CEMENT_QTY ,'00' AS STATUS ,'' AS GI_IF_DOC_SEQ ,'' AS RE_ID_DOC_SEQ ,'' AS GI_IF_RVS_DOC_SEQ ,'' AS RE_IF_RVS_DOC_SEQ ,'' AS SAP_RTN_MSG FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SUBSTR(SYSKEY , 3, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')

SELECT '10' AS MATER_SEQ ,(SELECT ('BP'||NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(SYSKEY , 3, 7))) + 1,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')) || '001')) FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER M WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SUBSTR(SYSKEY , 3, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')) AS SYSKEY ,M.MATER_CD ,M.MATER_NM_EN AS MATER_NM ,M.UNIT , 0 AS PROD_OUT_QTY ,'3002' AS STOR_LOCT -- ,(SELECT DECODE('EN','KR',CD.DETAIL_CD_NM_KR,'EN',CD.DETAIL_CD_NM_EN, CD.DETAIL_CD_NM_LO) NAME FROM LGIUSF.TB_COMM_CD_DETAIL CD WHERE COMPANY_CD = M.COMPANY_CD AND DETAIL_CD = '3001') AS STOR_LOCT ,'' AS ATTR1 FROM TB_MATER_INFO M WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND MATER_CD = '63202400' UNION ALL SELECT '20' AS MATER_SEQ ,(SELECT ('BP'||NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(SYSKEY , 3, 7))) + 1,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')) || '001')) FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER M WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SUBSTR(SYSKEY , 3, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')) AS SYSKEY ,M.MATER_CD ,M.MATER_NM_EN AS MATER_NM ,M.UNIT , 0 AS PROD_OUT_QTY ,'4001' AS STOR_LOCT -- ,(SELECT DECODE('EN','KR',CD.DETAIL_CD_NM_KR,'EN',CD.DETAIL_CD_NM_EN, CD.DETAIL_CD_NM_LO) NAME FROM LGIUSF.TB_COMM_CD_DETAIL CD WHERE COMPANY_CD = M.COMPANY_CD AND DETAIL_CD = '3001') AS STOR_LOCT ,'' AS ATTR1 FROM TB_MATER_INFO M WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND MATER_CD = '61000455'

SELECT '10' AS MATER_SEQ ,(SELECT ('BP'||NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(SYSKEY , 3, 7))) + 1,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')) || '001')) FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER M WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SUBSTR(SYSKEY , 3, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')) AS SYSKEY ,M.MATER_CD ,M.MATER_NM_EN AS MATER_NM ,M.UNIT ,0 AS PROD_IN_QTY ,'4002' AS STOR_LOCT -- ,(SELECT DECODE('EN','KR',CD.DETAIL_CD_NM_KR,'EN',CD.DETAIL_CD_NM_EN, CD.DETAIL_CD_NM_LO) NAME FROM LGIUSF.TB_COMM_CD_DETAIL CD WHERE COMPANY_CD = M.COMPANY_CD AND DETAIL_CD = '3002') AS STOR_LOCT ,'' AS ATTR1 FROM TB_MATER_INFO M WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND MATER_CD = '63101022'

UPDATE TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER SET PROD_DATE = ${prodDate}, POST_DATE = ${prodDate}, CEMENT_QTY = ${cementQty}, MODID = ${userId}, MODDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), MODTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SYSKEY = ${syskey} AND STATUS = '00'

UPDATE TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER SET DELETE_FLAG = 'Y', MODID = ${userId}, MODDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), MODTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SYSKEY = ${syskey} AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

UPDATE TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER SET STATUS = '01', MODID = ${userId}, MODDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), MODTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SYSKEY = ${syskey} AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND STATUS = '00'

UPDATE TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER SET STATUS = '00', MODID = ${userId}, MODDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), MODTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SYSKEY = ${syskey} AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND STATUS = '01'
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_CLINKER_PROD_MASTER WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND PROD_DATE = replace(${prodDate},'/','') AND STATUS = '04' AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

UPDATE TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER SET STATUS = '02', MODID = ${userId}, MODDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), MODTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), TRANS_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SYSKEY = ${syskey}

WITH INPUT_DATA AS ( SELECT C.SYSKEY ,C.COMPANY_CD ,C.MATER_SEQ ,C.MATER_CD ,NVL((SELECT ATTR1 FROM TB_COMM_CD_DETAIL M WHERE M.GROUP_CD = '2401' AND M.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND M.DETAIL_CD = C.MATER_CD ),'11140') AS KOSTL FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_INPUT C WHERE C.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND C.SYSKEY = ${syskey} ) SELECT O.SYSKEY ,O.COMPANY_CD ,O.MATER_SEQ ,O.MATER_CD ,I.KOSTL ,O.PLANT_CD ,O.STOR_LOCT ,O.PROD_OUT_QTY FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_OUTPUT O JOIN INPUT_DATA I ON O.COMPANY_CD = I.COMPANY_CD AND O.SYSKEY = I.SYSKEY WHERE O.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND O.SYSKEY = ${syskey}

SELECT C.SYSKEY ,C.COMPANY_CD ,C.MATER_SEQ ,C.MATER_CD ,NVL((SELECT ATTR1 FROM TB_COMM_CD_DETAIL M WHERE M.GROUP_CD = '2401' AND M.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND M.DETAIL_CD = C.MATER_CD ),'11140') AS KOSTL ,C.PLANT_CD ,C.STOR_LOCT ,C.PROD_IN_QTY FROM TB_CEMENT_PROD_INPUT C WHERE C.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND C.SYSKEY = ${syskey}

UPDATE TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER SET FISCAL_YEAR = NVL(${fiscalYear},''), {#1} GI_IF_STATUS = NVL(${returnType},''), GI_IF_DOC_SEQ = NVL(${returnSapGiNo},''), RE_IF_STATUS = NVL(${returnType},''), RE_IF_DOC_SEQ = NVL(${returnSapGrNo},''), SAP_RTN_MSG = NVL(${returnMsg},''), MODID = ${userId}, MODDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), MODTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), TRANS_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), IFSTCD = 'Y' WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SYSKEY = ${syskey}
STATUS = ${returnStatus},

UPDATE TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER SET STATUS = '05', CANCEL_TYPE = 'X', GI_IF_RVS_STATUS = NVL(${returnType},''), GI_IF_RVS_DOC_SEQ = NVL(${returnSapGiNo},''), RE_IF_RVS_STATUS = NVL(${returnType},''), RE_IF_RVS_DOC_SEQ = NVL(${returnSapGrNo},''), SAP_RTN_MSG = NVL(${returnMsg},''), MODID = ${userId}, MODDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), MODTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), TRANS_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), IFSTCD = 'Y' WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SYSKEY = ${syskey}

UPDATE TB_CEMENT_PROD_MASTER SET SAP_RTN_MSG = NVL(${returnMsg},''), MODID = ${userId}, MODDATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), MODTIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), TRANS_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), IFSTCD = 'Y' WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SYSKEY = ${syskey}
